extendedInfo.description: FilmOn is Free! Aereo is not. FilmOn enables you to watch live TV for free. Unlike Aereo who charge you, With FilmOn you can watch free TV from 40 Cities in the US in Standard Definition for free on your computer or mobile device wherever an internet connection is available. You can watch your local channels or select from our huge line-up of channels from the US, Europe, Latin America and Asia. Watch live Sports, News, Lifestyle, Movies, Shopping, Kids and more.If you wish to watch in HD and record your favourite shows or series, you can do so for a small fee.

reviews.title: What happened ?
reviews.comment: What happened ?  Used to watch my loacal channels on the local tv ( us flag) icon, now its gone... we want it back !!! Then you deserve 5 stars.
reviews.author: steven giannitelli

reviews.title: Beats tvc when overseas
reviews.comment: Love it TV catchup but works globally n stable too
reviews.author: tim rezgalla

reviews.title: amazing
reviews.comment: Had this app about 2 years ago.  Then deleted as TVCATCHUP had everything I needed and this developer kept changing the app.  Now this seems to be the only app that works well.   Good pic. Good choice of channels. Good app.   Thank you!
reviews.author: Darryl t

reviews.comment: thank you so much for putting something like this.I use to tell my friends here tanzania on how easy and good this mobile tv is.KUDOS
reviews.author: Mweteh Mwango

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: The best TV Streaming app on the market! Easy, fast, stable working, big channel base, amazing picture quality. I have never had any  problems with this app... So I really recommend it to everyone!
reviews.author: Susana Little

reviews.title: Ads ruin viewing experience
reviews.comment: This app used to be awesome but now they put ads on the top and bottom of channels making ur image smaller. it has completely ruined it for me as I can no longer utilise the full size of my screen. Was much better when ads were only on channel listings. Such a shame this was my favourite app. Not any more
reviews.author: Mathew Jarram

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Tried to download but phone says cannot download to default location anyone got any ideas how to make it work thanks

reviews.title: Perfect app

reviews.title: Ads ruin it
reviews.comment: Stable. Decent amount of channels. But recently they introduced ads below the screen so you cant use the full screen. Only downside but what an annoying downside it is.

reviews.title: Very Good !
reviews.comment: This is an overall good app and is very easy to use :) Five stars from me .

reviews.title: Excellent.
reviews.comment: Really good app, good clear picture and works on 3g. Had a little hiccup with it on the third day though, only sound and no picture, but been okay again since.

reviews.title: Best tv app
